description: Unofficial documentation dump for Veeam Data Cloud (VDC). SaaS backup platform including VDC for Microsoft 365, VDC for Azure, VDC for Salesforce, and VDC Vault (SaaS backup storage).
rules: This is unofficial documentation - always verify against official Veeam Help Center
Covers Veeam Data Cloud SaaS backup for M365, Azure, Salesforce, and Vault (SaaS backup storage)
